item.description:
You're invited...please join us for an evening with CT
Senatorial candidate Peter Schiff....

Date: Wednesday, May 5
Time: 6:30 pm - 8:30 pm
Location: Pastori's Restaurant* (back room),
87 West Rd. (Rt 83), Ellington

*You will be able to order off of the menu, if you choose.

Mr. Schiff will introduce himself to the group and then take
your questions. Here is a link to "SCHIFF for Senate."
http://schiffforsenat....

We hope to see you on May 5th.
The Tolland mini-Tea Party

Suzanne Marinan
CT 2nd District Tea Party Patriots Webstie:
www.site.ct2nddistrictteapartypatriots.com
item.name: Meet and Greet Peter Schiff in Ellington
